Articles.Content:
This Planet is what it is!.....A ball of gas it seems, I never reached a solid surface to land on and it seemed as though the gravity fluctuates terribly there, has anyone landed there on something solid are am I correct about it being only gas? I'm guessing the gas may be the reason my throttle was acting as if the Gravity Fluctuated?

Edited July 2, 2014 by castille7
